price: E, se eles discutem contigo, dize: "Allah é bem Sabedor do que fazeis."
arabic: وَإِن جَٰدَلُوكَ فَقُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-in jādalūka faquli al-lahu aʿlamu bimā taʿmalūna
